author: cyberroninn
content:
Going through the yellowpaper again, and I can see references as late as 2022

In fact this yellowpaper version is from august 2023, so it's a bit of a curiousity why the part about mining proof of work hasn't been updated to proof of stake ?

Is this intentional  ?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
> The Yellow Paper is out of date. It reflects the Ethereum specification up to the Berlin network upgrade, activated on the Ethereum mainnet at block 12_244_000 (April 2021).
> 
> It does not contain changes introduced in following network upgrades, including London, Paris, or any post-merge upgrade.

https://github.com/ethereum/yellowpaper

author: cyberroninn
content: well that makes sense, this date here sure threw me off:
